page.title: 17Acklington Characters (2)
page.content: {Chris Pickering}of Field House Farm is interested in local politics. At the last meeting of the Parish Council Chris was unanimously elected chairman and, together with other members, discussed items such as: speed limits through the village, prison escapes, bales blocking public footpaths, plans for erection of bungalow at Acklington Park, the appointment of governors for local school and unauthorised litter. {Jane Chapman}of 44 Acklington Village has the distinction of spending 52 years at Acklington School, first as a pupil and then as a teacher, and still regularly attends school functions. {Arnott Dobson}of 18 Acklington Village and{Tony Hall}of Cheeveley have both shown great initiative by setting up their own small businesses at their homes. Arnott is a craftsman boat- builder and Tony a haulage contractor.
